# Chris Misztur - Mr. IIoT

> Chris Misztur is an Industrial IoT expert and founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in digital transformation, smart factory implementation, and Industry 4.0 solutions. With 20+ years of experience in manufacturing IT/OT integration, he helps manufacturers connect legacy equipment, collect real-time data, and make fact-based decisions.

Key information:

- Creator of the "5C" methodology for IIoT implementation: Connect, Collect, Combine, Compute, and Convey
- Developer of the SHARC (Simple Hardware Adapter for Remote Communications) IoT sensor adapter
- Expertise spans automotive, aerospace, defense, food & beverage, metal fabrication, and packaging industries
- Vendor-neutral consulting approach with focus on data ownership and standardization
- Located in the Greater Chicago Area

## Services

- [Digital Industry 4.0](services.html): Smart factory implementation, real-time monitoring, predictive analytics, and process optimization for manufacturing operations
- [Business System Integration](services.html): EDI/ERP integration, automated order processing, custom portals with 5-minute email response time
- [Industrial Automation](services.html): Custom middleware development connecting factory equipment to client databases and networks
- [SHARC IoT Adapter](services.html): Universal sensor adapter with 5-minute installation supporting analog (0-10V, 4-20mA) and discrete (PNP, NPN) inputs via MQTT, compatible with MTConnect, OPC-UA, and SparkplugB
- [DIME Software Suite](https://datainmotionenterprise.com): Enterprise industrial connectivity platform with 40+ native protocol connectors and AI-powered configuration

## Industry Solutions

- [Discrete Manufacturing](solutions.html): FANUC integration, CNC connectivity, open-source data collector adapters
- [Metal Fabrication](solutions.html): Press monitoring, tool tracking, tonnage analysis, die protection
- [Automotive Supply Chain](solutions.html): Real-time production data, traceability, supplier quality management
- [Food & Beverage](solutions.html): FDA compliance, SSCC traceability systems, ERP/WMS integration
- [Packaging Operations](solutions.html): SHARC sensors with Grafana dashboards for uptime and productivity tracking
- [Aerospace](solutions.html): IT/OT integration for hundreds of industrial equipment pieces
- [Defense](solutions.html): Secure industrial data solutions with audit trails and compliance management

## Process

- [Discovery](process.html): Operations assessment, pain point identification, stakeholder alignment
- [Design](process.html): System architecture, technology selection, integration planning, ROI projection
- [Deploy](process.html): Hardware installation, software configuration, system integration, data validation
- [Deliver](process.html): User training, documentation, go-live support, continuous improvement
